item.title: Download
item.description: Download # Latest Releases # Version: v0.2.2 (May 06, 2023) Windows Files: Portable ZIP: TemporaryEscape-v0.2.2-Windows.zip Installer: TemporaryEscape-v0.2.2-Windows.msi Linux Files: AppImage: TemporaryEscape-v0.2.2-Linux.AppImage TAR Archive: TemporaryEscape-v0.2.2-Linux.tar.gz MacOS Files: System Requirements # These are the minimum system requirements. You must have Vulkan 1.1 (or higher) compatible graphics card and a 64-bit operating system. The game may run on a lower hardware.
